message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I know it would be a valuable asset to your business. I'm asking for $1,400,000 to start negotiations.  What do you think?

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,250,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to my business.

Bob, I understand your position on the price, but I believe $1,400,000 is a fair reflection of the product's value.  To move things along, I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I still think $1,250,000 is a more reasonable price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1,300,000. Can you consider this price?
